mapper.select: SELECT po.*, si.*, oi_prod_qty, oi_tot_price, oi_tracking_company, oi_tracking_num, oi_etc, oi_del_status, t.p_pid, p_name, p_price, p_discount, p_point, t.p_stock_quantity, t.p_delivery_price FROM PRODUCT_ORDER po JOIN order_items oi on po.po_no = oi.oi_po_no JOIN seller_info si ON oi.oi_s_u_id = si.s_u_id JOIN PRODUCT_ITEM t ON oi.oi_p_pid = t.p_pid WHERE po_u_id = #{u_id} ORDER BY po_orderdate DESC OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT 5 ROWS ONLY

SELECT po.*, si.*, oi_prod_qty, oi_tot_price, oi_tracking_company, oi_tracking_num, oi_etc, oi_del_status, t.p_pid, p_name, p_price, p_discount, p_point, t.p_stock_quantity, t.p_delivery_price FROM PRODUCT_ORDER po JOIN order_items oi on po.po_no = oi.oi_po_no JOIN seller_info si ON oi.oi_s_u_id = si.s_u_id JOIN PRODUCT_ITEM t ON oi.oi_p_pid = t.p_pid
ORDER BY po_orderdate DESC OFFSET #{pageRequestDTO.offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageRequestDTO.size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT po.*, si.*, oi_prod_qty, oi_tot_price, oi_tracking_company, oi_tracking_num, oi_etc, oi_del_status, t.P_PID, p_name, p_price, p_discount, p_point, t.P_STOCK_QUANTITY, t.P_DELIVERY_PRICE FROM PRODUCT_ORDER po JOIN order_items oi on po.po_no = oi.oi_po_no JOIN seller_info si ON oi.oi_s_u_id = si.s_u_id JOIN PRODUCT_ITEM t ON oi.OI_P_PID = t.P_PID WHERE po_u_id = #{u_id} AND po_no = #{po_no} ORDER BY po_orderdate DESC
